items.content_html: Lightweight Durable TypeScript Workflows
items.title: dbos-inc/dbos-transact-ts: Lightweight Durable TypeScript Workflows

items.content_html: PhilQuery is a lightweight, citation-based research assistant designed to help users ask complex philosophical questions and receive answers backed by source material. It uses a custom RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline with Sentence-Transformers for embeddings and FAISS for semantic search.
items.title: arthuroker/PhilQuery: PhilQuery is a lightweight, citation-based research assistant designed to help users ask complex philosophical questions and receive answers backed by source material. It uses a custom RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline with Sentence-Transformers for embeddings and FAISS for semantic search.

items.content_html: A lightweight React application that interfaces with an LLM-powered Email Response Generator via a custom wrapper API.
items.title: Walediwura/smart-reply-test-frontend: A lightweight React application that interfaces with an LLM-powered Email Response Generator via a custom wrapper API.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript module (static-firebase-rtdb) for simplifying Firebase Realtime Database interactions in static frontend projects. Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.
items.title: ramithwork/frontend-firebase-rtdb: A lightweight JavaScript module (static-firebase-rtdb) for simplifying Firebase Realtime Database interactions in static frontend projects. Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable web GIS platform for the state of Goa, India. Designed as a community maintained tool for hyperlocal spatial data exploration and decision making.
items.title: publicmap/amche-goa: A lightweight and customizable web GIS platform for the state of Goa, India. Designed as a community maintained tool for hyperlocal spatial data exploration and decision making.

items.title: paradite/send-prompt: A lightweight library to send prompt to models

items.content_html: A lightweight offline web development environment for teaching front-end technologies. Features HTML/CSS/JS editing with syntax highlighting, real-time preview, and offline support as a Chrome extension. Built with CodeMirror, it provides a clean interface ideal for beginners while demonstrating modern web development practices.
items.title: mitchelldawkinsjr/WebBasics-IDE: A lightweight offline web development environment for teaching front-end technologies. Features HTML/CSS/JS editing with syntax highlighting, real-time preview, and offline support as a Chrome extension. Built with CodeMirror, it provides a clean interface ideal for beginners while demonstrating modern web development practices.

items.content_html: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.
items.title: jacobovidal/oauth-fetch: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
